subproject.corporate outcome: Legislatures, regional elected bodies, and local assemblies have strengthened institutional capacity, enabling them to represent their constituents more effectively
subproject.description:
Support for Strengthening of Parliamentary Democracy in Bhutan.  Institutional Strengthening and Capacity Development Support for the Parliament fo Bhutan for effective legislative functioning.

- Enhanced capacity of key organizations in conducting free and fair elections at national and local levels.

- Enhanced capacity of the parliament and its secretariats for its effective legislative functioning.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Support for Parliamentary
